abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Kansas City Royals, 13-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz passed two Hall of Famers with his 476th home run, and the Boston Red Sox banged out 13 extra-base hits Sunday in a 13-2 victory over the host Kansas City Royals.

headline.main: Red Sox Overwhelm Royals, Piling Up 13 Extra-Base Hits
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Overwhelm Royals, Piling Up 13 Extra-Base Hits

snippet: David Ortiz passed two Hall of Famers with his 476th home run, and the Boston Red Sox banged out 13 extra-base hits Sunday in a 13-2 victory over the host Kansas City Royals.
